## Source: amazon-inspector (5f49ca2c72725bef26372372dfae65145d32d2d69179865156de7a930c88853d)
The package @nosinovacao/nosid-mfe-common was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (25057d10d77346d5d3f70926ed0a9dee7e2a793435848a3e7c217b94727463a8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@nosinovacao/nosid-mfe-common' @ 99991.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
